left.description: Left 1D data array used to calculate scalar covariance. Used only if `data` not provided.

right.description: Right 1D data array used to calculate scalar covariance. Used only if `data` not provided.

data.description: 2D data array used to construct covariance matrix.

name: dp_covariance

privacy_usage.description: Object describing the type and amount of privacy to be used for the mechanism release.

finite_sample_correction.description: Whether or not to use the finite sample correction (Bessel's correction).

description:
Calculate differentially private covariance.

 If `data` argument is provided as a 2D array, calculate covariance matrix. Otherwise, `left` and `right` 1D arrays are used to calculate a single covariance.
